document_data.mainbody:
KithyymThe map included in The Shining South (1993) labels this town as Kithtym. was a small town located in the nation of Halruaa during the 14 century DR.
Kithyym was located on the coast of southern Halruaa. The town lay along the shore of the eastern half of the Bay of Taertal on the Great Sea just south of Halagard.
